title: [CLIENT] Selecting chromas in team builder will sometimes revert you back to base colors.
body:
Or well, more specifically, I bought the recolors for Blitz's base skin, and selected the red one before searching for a team, and twice in a row it went with normal golden crank. This probably has more to do with the chroma packs, but I don't have time to do tests. I assume that once I've found a team I can probably fix this manually if I remember, but it's just confusing to select it once, and then have to select it again, it doesn't occur to me immediately to check that.

Not a huge deal, just thought you ought to know.

replies.body:
Hey DewHex,

Thanks for the report! This is something we've been aware of, but unfortunately don't have a solid repro for. :c It's definitely an issue with the chroma packs. I personally use the Nami chroma pack often, and I've found that clicking off the chroma and re-selecting works - I've never had this issue when I do those steps. It's not the best workaround, but it's the best way I've found to get around this issue.
